entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 10 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
